title: Where's the two chests
body: I don't get any chest. Please Help me

replies.body: I'm not really able to look into your specific issue personally with the details given, but in general there are a few requirements to be eligible for chests.  For example, you need to own the champion and have exceeded the limit available for that week.  I suggest going over our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide for more information on how mastery chests work.  Let me know in detail if you have any questions!
